original_solution_mapping.L1: The birds eat this many tomatoes: 21 / 3 = <<21/3=7>>7 tomatoes.
original_solution_mapping.L2: There are this many tomatoes left on the plant: 21 - 7 = <<21-7=14>>14 tomatoes.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5057.
    Returns: the number of tomatoes left on the plant.
    """
    # L1
    total_tomatoes = 21 # 21 cherry tomatoes on the tomato plant
    fraction_denominator = 3 # one-third of the tomatoes
    eaten_tomatoes = total_tomatoes / fraction_denominator

    # L2
    remaining_tomatoes = total_tomatoes - eaten_tomatoes

    # FA
    answer = remaining_tomatoes
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The birds eat this many tomatoes: {total_tomatoes} / {fraction_denominator} = <<{total_tomatoes}/{fraction_denominator}={eaten_tomatoes}>>{eaten_tomatoes} tomatoes.
There are this many tomatoes left on the plant: {total_tomatoes} - {eaten_tomatoes} = <<{total_tomatoes}-{eaten_tomatoes}={remaining_tomatoes}>>{remaining_tomatoes} tomatoes.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The birds eat this many tomatoes: 3 / 3 = <<3/3=1>>1 tomatoes.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: There are this many tomatoes left on the plant: 21 - 1 = <<21-1=20>>20 tomatoes.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'fraction_denominator' (3) was used instead of 'total_tomatoes' (21).
